meanings.definition: To utter a sound expressing surprise, admiration, or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: She oohed when she saw the cute puppy.
meanings.sent2: The children oohed at the colorful fireworks.
meanings.sent3: The audience oohed as the magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The crowd oohed in amazement as the acrobat performed daring stunts.
meanings.sent5: The little girl oohed with delight when she opened her birthday present.

meanings.definition: Past tense of 'ooh', to make a sound expressing surprise, admiration, or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: He oohed when he tasted the delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: The friends oohed after watching a thrilling movie.
meanings.sent3: The family oohed at the impressive fireworks display.
meanings.sent4: The students oohed in awe as the teacher performed a cool science experiment.
meanings.sent5: The baby oohed happily when given a new toy.
